effect.title: Particle Id
effect.description: The name of a particle effect that should be played

locator.title: Locator
locator.description: The name of a locator on the actor where the effect should be located

pre_effect_script.title: Pre Effect Script
pre_effect_script.description: A molang script that will be run when the particle emitter is initialized

bind_to_actor.title: Bind To Actor
bind_to_actor.description: Set to false to have the effect spawned in the world without being bound to an actor (by default an effect is bound to the actor).

PositionV3.title: Position Array
PositionV3.description: An array of 3 items that describe the bones position

items.title: Position X
items.description:
The position over the X-axis or forwards/backwards.
Can be molang or a float

items.title: Position Y
items.description:
The position over the Y-axis, or up/down.
Can be molang or a float

items.title: Position Z
items.description:
The position over the Z-axis, or left/right.
Can be molang or a float

RotationV3.title: Rotation Array
RotationV3.description: An array of 3 items that describe the bones rotation

items.title: Rotation X
items.description:
The rotation over the X-axis, or up or down.
Can be molang or a float

items.title: Rotation Y
items.description:
The rotation over the Y-axis, or yaw.
Can be molang or a float

items.title: Rotation Z
items.description:
The rotation over the Z-axis, or roll.
Can be molang or a float

ScaleV3.title: Scale Array
ScaleV3.description: An array of 3 items that describe the bones position

items.title: Position X
items.description:
The position over the X-axis or forwards/backwards.
Can be molang or a float

items.title: Position Y
items.description:
The position over the Y-axis, or up/down.
Can be molang or a float

items.title: Position Z
items.description:
The position over the Z-axis, or left/right.
Can be molang or a float

effect.title: Effect
effect.description: Valid sound effect names should be listed in the entity's resource_definition json file.

format_version.title: 1.10.0 Format Version
format_version.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

anim_time_update.title: Start Delay
anim_time_update.description: How does time pass when playing the animation. Defaults to "query.anim_time + query.delta_time" which means advance in seconds.

animation_length.title: Animation Length
animation_length.description: Override calculated value (set as the last keyframe time) and set animation length in seconds.

bones.title: Bones
bones.description: Defines how the bones in an animation move or transform

additionalProperties.title: Bone Transformation
additionalProperties.description: The bone definition that declare how it transforms during animation

position.title: Position
position.description: The Position transformation during this animation

rotation.title: Rotation
rotation.description: The rotation transformation during this animation

relative_to.title: Relative To
relative_to.description: If set, makes the bone rotation relative to the entity instead of the bone's parent

rotation.title: Rotation
rotation.description: If set, makes the bone rotation relative to the entity instead of the bone's parent

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Should this animation stop, loop, or stay on the last frame when finished (true, false, hold_on_last_frame)

loop_delay.title: Loop Delay
loop_delay.description: How long to wait in seconds before looping this animation. Note that this expression is evaluated after each loop and on looping animation only.

override_previous_animation.title: Override Previous Animation
override_previous_animation.description: Reset bones in this animation to the default pose before applying this animation.

start_delay.title: Start Delay
start_delay.description: How long to wait in seconds before playing this animation. Note that this expression is evaluated once before playing, and only re-evaluated if asked to play from the beginning again. A looping animation should use 'loop_delay' if it wants a delay between loops.
